tuv.seg: Seanad - election of university candidates
Seanad - toghchán iarrthóirí ollscoile
The Constitution states that 6 members of the Seanad may be elected by the universities of Ireland
Is féidir, de réir an Bhunreachta, le Ollscoileanna na hÉireann seisear a thoghadh chuig an Seanad
The University Constituency consists of graduates of the National University of Ireland and the University of Dublin
Is iad céimithe Ollscoil na hÉireann agus Ollscoil Bhaile Átha Cliath iad toghcheantar na hollscoile
To put yourself forward as a candidate for the Seanad, you must be nominated by 2 registered electors for a university
Ní mór go mbeadh duine ainmnithe ag beirt vótálaithe cláraithe ollscoile mar iarrthóir don Seanad
Eight other registered electors for the university concerned must assent to the nomination
Ní mór go n-aontóidh ochtar eile vótálaithe don ollscoil chuí leis an ainmniúchán
You do not have to be a graduate of the university concerned or be connected to it in any way
Ní gá gur céimí de chuid na hollscoile cuí thú ná go mbeadh aon cheangal agat leis an ollscoil sin
However, you must be eligible to become a Senator
Ach, ní mór duit a bheith intofa mar Sheanadóir
Voting in the university elections for the Seanad is done by post
Vótáil phoist atá i gceist le toghcháin na nOllscoileanna don Seanad
The returning officer sends a ballot paper and a "declaration of identity" form to every person eligible to vote
Cuireann an Ceann Comhaireamh páipéar ballóide agus "foirm dhearbhú aitheantais" chuig gach duine a bhfuil vóta aige/aici
The voter completes the declaration of identity form in the presence of a witness
Comhlíonann an vótálaí an fhoirm dhearbhú aitheantais i láthair finné
They then complete the ballot paper by marking their order of preference of candidates
Ansin, comhlíonann sé/sí an páipéar ballóide le vóta a thabhairt de réir a rogha do na hiarrthóirí
Both the declaration of identity and the ballot paper are sent back to the returning officer
Cuirtear an dearbhú aitheantais agus an páipéar ballóide ar ais chuig an gCeann Comhaireamh
The votes are counted and the system of proportional representation with single transferable vote applies
Déantar na vótaí a chomhaireamh de réir na hionadaíochta cionúire ar mhodh an aonghutha inaistrithe
If a casual vacancy arises it will be filled by a by-election
Má thagann folúntas aníos ó am go chéile tionólfar fo-thoghchán len é a líonadh
The procedure is the same as in an ordinary election except that only one candidate is elected instead of 6
Tá an córas vótála mar an gcéanna le gnáth thoghchán ach go ndéantar iarrthóir amháin a thogh in áit seisear
To vote in an election of university members to the Seanad, you must:
Le vóta a chaitheamh i dtoghchán baill ollscoile chuig an Seanad, ní mór duit:
• Be an Irish citizen
• A bheith i do shaoránach Éireannach
• Be over 18 years old
• A bheith ós cionn 18
• Have received a degree (not an honorary degree) from one of the Universities of Ireland
• Céim a bheith bainte amach agat (ní leor céim oinigh) ó cheann de Ollscoileanna na hÉireann
• Be registered as an elector
• A bheith cláraithe mar vótálaí

If you are a graduate of an NUI constituent university or recognised college (pdf), you will be issued with a registration claim form at the time of conferring, however, you can request a registration form (pdf) at any time

Más céimí de chuid Ollscoil na hÉireann (OÉ) thú chomh ollscoil nó coláiste aitheanta (pdf), tabharfar foirm éilimh ar chlárú duit nuair a bhronnfar ort do chéim, ach, is féidir foirm chláraithe (pdf) a éileamh ag am ar bith

If you are a graduate of the University of Dublin (Trinity College) you will be issued with a registration claim form at the time of conferring, however, you can request a registration form (pdf) at any time

Más céimí thú d' Ollscoil Bhaile Átha Cliath (Coláiste na Tríonóide), tabharfar foirm éilimh ar chlárú duit nuair a bhronnfar ort do chéim, ach, is féidir foirm chláraithe (pdf) a éileamh ag am ar bith
Graduates of NUI and the University of Dublin must return completed registration claim forms by 26 February to be listed in their respective Seanad Éireann registers, which are published on 1 June

Ní mór do chéimithe OÉ agus Ollscoil Bhaile Átha Cliath foirmeacha éilimh ar chlárú comhlíonta a chur ar ais faoin 26 Feabhra le bheith san áireamh ar chlár Sheanad Éireann, a fhoilsítear gach bliain ar 1 Meitheamh
If you are registered as an elector with the university, you will receive a declaration of identity form and a ballot paper in the post
Má tá tú cláraithe mar vótálaí leis an Ollscoil, gheobhaidh tú foirm dhearbhú aitheantais agus páipéar ballóide sa phost
You must complete the form and mark your ballot paper
Ní mór duit an fhoirm a chomhlíonadh agus an páipéar ballóide a mharcáil
You must then send both papers back to the returning officer for the university
Ní mór duit ansin an dá pháipéar a chur ar ais chuig oifig an cheann chomhairimh san Ollscoil
